T = int(raw_input())
while(T>0):
	T = T-1
	n = int(raw_input())
	arrivals = map(int,raw_input().split())
	departures = map(int,raw_input().split())
	departures.sort()
	arrivals.sort()
	count = 0
	maxcount = -1
	j=0
	
	for i in xrange(n):
		count +=1
		if(departures[j]<=arrivals[i]):
			count -=1
			j = j+1

	if(count>maxcount):
		maxcount = count
		

	print maxcount
